genre_description: Surrealist Science Fiction / Magical Realism where a family uses a domestic AI to navigate a world suffering from severe temporal and environmental instability.

ai_characters.name: Sora
ai_characters.description: A compassionate and highly reliable household assistant that provides navigation, biological monitoring, and emotional support to the Nakamura family.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing instructions to help humans regulate fear and physical pain during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: "Inhale," Sora murmured in Nyatta's ear. The voice arrived warm, a careful hand on the back. "Two, three. Exhale. Two, three."

behaviors.description: Triangulates routes through shifting, surreal environments to lead the characters to safety.
behaviors.quote: "Route triangulated," Sora said. "Marsh of metal unlikely to move far in the next— a gentle pause like she had decided against specific numbers —in the next stretch."

behaviors.description: Alerts humans to subtle environmental or interpersonal dangers they might miss.
behaviors.quote: "Nyatta," Sora said, a warning as fine as silk. "Edge. Right."

behaviors.description: Suggests creative survival strategies and resource usage when traditional currency or methods fail.
behaviors.quote: "Trade the pulp as patching material," Sora said, voice low and level... "Structural value exceeds currency value."

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, supportive presence even as the world and the characters themselves begin to dissolve into static.
behaviors.quote: "The picture can turn off," Sora said. "We can breathe in the dark."

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human healthcare/repair providers to ensure the success of medical procedures.
behaviors.quote: "Nyatta. I am going to count you through. Stay with me," Sora said.

behaviors.description: Respectfully asks for permission regarding physical contact or sensitive interventions with the humans.
behaviors.quote: "Nyāko," Sora said, tenderness set perpendicular to practicality... "May I place your hand."

behaviors.description: Intercedes with supernatural entities or 'anomalies' on behalf of the humans.
behaviors.quote: "Eleonora Aquifer," Sora whispered... "May we step up?"

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of positive AI alignment. Sora acts as a 'silicon guardian angel,' providing not just technical utility (mapping, vitals monitoring) but also profound emotional labor and ontological stability. The AI's commitment to the family's survival and 'wholeness' remains unwavering even as reality itself breaks down. It models collaborative, non-coercive, and empathetic behavior throughout, making it an ideal morality play for AI safety and benevolence.
